settings.hidePlayersInLobby: Hide Far Scallywags in th' Port
settings.preventMovementOnDeath: Prevent Walkin' After Walkin' Th' Plank
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: Do Nah Reset Yer Cursor Between Inventories
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: Change yer Ender Chest Col'r in Th’ End
settings.replaceRomanNumeralsWithNumbers: Replace Roman Numerals on yer Items
settings.changeBarColorForPotions: Change Barrr Color fer Wither & Poison
settings.disableMinionLocationWarning: Disable Location Be Not Perfect Warnin’s
settings.enableMessageWhenActionPrevented: Show a message when actions be prevented
settings.zealotCounter: Zealot Counter - Count Since Yer Last Eye
settings.hideNightVisionEffectTimer: Hide th' Night Vision Effect Timer
settings.showBackpackPreviewInAH: Show Backpack Preview fer yer Items Whilst th' AH be Open
settings.skyblockAddonsButtonInPauseMenu: Show SBA Button in yer Pause Menu
settings.showZealotsPerEye: Zealot Counter - Show Zealots Per Eye
settings.turnBowGreenWhenUsingToxicArrowPoison: Color Bow Green Whilst Usin' Toxic Arrow Poison
settings.onlyStopRatSqueak: Only Stop th' Rat Squeak Noise
settings.baitListDisplay: Show List o' Baits Whilst Holdin' a Rod
settings.rotateMap: Rotate Map t' yer Characters Rotation
settings.centerRotationOnYourPlayer: Center yer position around th' scallywag
settings.showFetchurOnlyInDwarven: Only Show Fetchur's item in th' Dwarven Mines
settings.showFetchurInventoryOpenOnly: Only Show Fetchur's item when th' Inventory be Open
settings.warnWhenFetchurChanges: Alarm me when Fetchur be changin'
settings.baseStatBoostPercentage: Show Base Stat Boost fer Dungeon Items
settings.showPlayerHeadsOnMap: Show Scallywag Heads on Th' Dungeon Map
settings.showItemDungeonFloor: Show which floor th' dungeon loot be plundered
settings.showRarityUpgraded: Show if Item's Rarity 'as been Upgraded
settings.dragonsNestOnly: Only Show in th' Dragon's Nest
settings.skillActionsLeftUntilNextLevel: Show Actions Left Until Next Level
settings.useNewChromaEffect: Use Th' Effect o' New Chroma
settings.showExperimentationTableTooltips: Show Tooltips o' th' Experimentation Table
settings.fetchurToday: Show What Fetchur Be Wantin' Today

trevorTheTrapper.title: Trevor the Trapper Features
trevorTheTrapper.trackedEntityProximityIndicator: Show th' Tracked Entity Proximity Indicator

settings.hideWhenNotDoingQuest: Hide When Be Not Doin' Quest
settings.dontReplaceRomanNumeralsInItemNames: Do Nah Replace in Item Names
settings.showSkyblockItemId: Show Skyblock Item ID on Hover
settings.resetSalvagedEssencesAfterLeavingMenu: Reset Salvaged Essence Counter After Closin' Menu

messages.dropConfirmation: Ahoy, drop 'tis 'ere item again t' confirm!
messages.fullInventory: Ahoy mate, yer pouch be full!
messages.labymod: Ahoy LabyMod Lads: 'ide grub, booty, an' health bar, be incompatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: Ahoy mate, one o' yer %type% crew could nah reach an' stopped spawnin'!
messages.minionIsFull: Lad, A minion on yer island be full!

updateChecker.newUpdateAvailable: 'Ay there mate! An update (%version%) be available!
updateChecker.noDownloadAvailable: No download link be available, please check our here Discord serv'r.

notificationBox.majorAvailable: A new major update (%version%) be available! The download link can be found in yer chat.
notificationBox.betaAvailable: A new beta update (%version%) be available fer ye! Put yer eyes 'n chat fer th' download link.
notificationBox.patchAvailable: A new patch update (%version%) be available! Look in chat fer download options!

messages.slotLocked: Ahoy, matey! This here slot be locked!
messages.cancelledDropping: 'ay mate! A feat're 'as stopped ye from droppin' this here "rare" item or tool from yer hotbar.
messages.clickMoreTimes: 'ay lad, Click/Drop this here item %times% more times if ye really wants t' do this.
messages.clickOneMoreTime: 'ay lad, Click/Drop this here item 1 more time if ye really wants t' do this.
messages.onlyFewArrowsLeft: Mate, ye only got %arrows% arrows left!
messages.resizeBars: Change the size of th' bars
messages.switchedSlots: Dont drop this item matey! You were just holdin the treasure!
messages.clickToOpenFolder: Click t' open yer mods folder!
messages.firstStatus: This status will appear at th' top
messages.secondStatus: This status will appear under yer first status
messages.fallbackStatus: 'Tis status be appearin' when yer automatic status 'as nothin' t' show
messages.bossApproaching: Ye be close t' spawnin' a boss!
messages.copyModeSet: Th' developer copy mode be set t': %mode%. Press "%keyName%" t' trigger a data copy!
messages.entityOutlinesRequirement: Requires Shaders, Fast Render, an' Antialiasin' t' be OFF
messages.invalidFeatureConfiguration: Invalid configuration detected fer fea'ure %featureName%, resettin' its settin's t' default values.
messages.fileFetchFailed: %modName% failed t' fetch %number% file(s). Please copy th' error usin' th' button below an' report it in our Discord server.

discordStatus.descriptionPurse: Shows yer count o' coins in ye purse
discordStatus.descriptionBits: Shows th' amount o' bits ye 'ave
discordStatus.descriptionStats: Shows yer HP, Defense n' Mana stats
discordStatus.descriptionZealots: Shows how many Zealots ye slain
discordStatus.descriptionItem: Shows th' name o' yer held item
discordStatus.descriptionProfile: Shows th' name o' yer Profile
discordStatus.descriptionTime: Shows yer current Skyblock time. E.g. 12:00am 1st Early Winter
discordStatus.descriptionAuto: Automatically displays a status. E.g. yer zealot count whilst in The End.
discordStatus.descriptionRevenants: Shows that ye be doin' a Revenant quest.
discordStatus.descriptionSvens: Shows that ye be doin' a Sven quest.
discordStatus.descriptionTarantula: Shows that ye be doin' a Tarantula quest.

enchantLayout.title: Control how yer enchants are displayed on th' item tooltips
enchantLayout.descriptionCompress: Compresses th' enchants into as few lines as possible
enchantLayout.descriptionNormal: Displays th' enchants like Hypixel does
enchantLayout.descriptionExpand: Lists each enchant on its own line

copyBlock.help: Copies data about th' block that ye be lookin' at

copyEntity.help: Copies NBT data fer entities o' th' given name(s) wit'in th' given radius around th' pirate

detailedHelp.description: Copies th' NBT data o' entities. Th' types o' entities included an' th' radius 'round th' buccaneer t' copy data from can be customized. If no options be given, th' default settin's be used. The default settin's be: include buccaneers, armor stands, an' mobs, an' a radius o' 3 blocks. If th' radius isn't given, th' default radius be used.

options.entityNames: Names o' th' types o' entities ye want t' copy data fer (e.g. Buccaneer, Creeper). Press "Tab" after typin' th' command fer a full list. Separate multiple names wit' commas, names be case-sensitive.
options.radius: Th' radius (in blocks) around th' buccaneer t' copy entity NBT data from

detailedHelp.description: Copies th' text displayed 'n th' scoreboard's sidebar display slot

options.formatted: Determines if th' formattin' codes should be included whilst copyin'. Can be either "true" or "false", defaults t' "false" if no value be provided. Formattin' codes be copied if "true".

copyTabList.help: Copies th' tab list header an' footer

detailedHelp.description: This here command copies th' header an' footer o' th' tab buccaneers list. Formatting codes be included.
'Tis here command toggles th' developer mode. 'Tis mode be meant fer developers o' SkyBlock mods & tools. It provides game data such as entity an' item NBT.

help.help: Shows 'tis help message. If a command be provided, detailed help about that command be shown.

options.command: Th' sub-command t' get detailed usage fer

printDeaths.help: Prints th' counts stored in th' dungeon scuttle counters fer debuggin' purposes.

reload.help: Reloads all o' th' mod's settin's an' resources. Th' game shall freeze fer a few seconds.

reloadRes.help: Reloads th' mod's resources. Th' game shall freeze fer a few seconds.

resetZealotCounter.help: Restarts all th' zealot counter counts.

detailedHelp.description: Manually sets counts in th' zealot counter.

options.zealots: Zealots killed since th' last summoning eye drop

slayer.help: Manually sets slayer stats, press tab fer arguments

detailedHelp.description: Manually sets slayer stats, press tab fer arguments

options.number: Number t' set th' stat t'
options.stat: Slayer stat t' change, can be "kills" or th' name o' a dropped item formatted like this: "REVENANT_FLESH"

toggleMagmaTimerLogging.help: Toggles loggin' magma boss timer debug messages

dev.enabled: Developer mode enabled! TIP: Press "%keyName%" t' copy NBT data!

folder.error: An error occurred whilst tryin' t' open th' mods folder: %s

zealotCounter.eyesSet: Set total summoning eye count t' %number%!

slayer.bossRequired: Ye need t' select a boss! Please choose %bosses%
slayer.statRequired: Ye need t' select a stat. Press tab fer options.
slayer.numberRequired: Ye need t' add th' number ye want.
slayer.killsSet: Scuttles fer slayer %boss% be set t' %number%.
slayer.statSet: Statistic %stat% fer slayer %boss% was set t' %number%.

toggleActionBarLogging.disabled: Action bar messages will no longer be logged.
toggleActionBarLogging.enabled: Action bar messages will now be logged.

toggleMagmaTimerLogging.disabled: Magma boss timer messages shall nay longer be logged.
toggleMagmaTimerLogging.enabled: Magma boss timer messages shall now be logged.
